mapper.select: SELECT * FROM userTravelHistory where addDayStatFlag=1 and userId=#{userId} order by id desc limit 1
SELECT endTime FROM userTravelHistory where userId=#{userId} order by id desc limit 1
SELECT * FROM userTravelHistory where addDayStatFlag=1 and id=#{travelId} order by id desc limit 1
SELECT * FROM userTravelHistory where addDayStatFlag=1 and userId=#{userId} and id<${id} order by id desc limit ${recordNum}
